0.text: Innate: Ezreal's abilities generate a stack of Rising Spell Force for every enemy they hit, stacking up to 5 times and lasting for 6 seconds, refreshing the duration on subsequent hits. Each stack grants him  10% bonus attack speed, up to 50% at 5 stacks.
Active: Ezreal fires a bolt of energy in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit and applies  on-hit and  on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness.

1.text: If Mystic Shot successfully hits an enemy, Ezreal's abilities' cooldowns are  reduced by 1.5 seconds (including Mystic Shot's).

0.text: Active: Ezreal fires an orb in the target direction that sticks onto first enemy  champion, epic  monster, or structure hit for 4 seconds.

1.text: His next basic attack or ability against the target detonates the orb, dealing them magic damage.

2.text: If the orb was detonated with an ability, Ezreal restores the  mana cost of that ability plus  60 mana.

0.text: Active: After the cast time, Ezreal  blinks from his current location up-to 475 units towards the target location, firing a homing bolt that deals magic damage to the nearest enemy and briefly  reveals them.

1.text: Arcane Shift prioritizes targets hit by  Essence Flux.

2.text: The bolt does not require the target to be  visible.

0.text: Active: Ezreal fires an energy projectile in the target direction, which briefly grants  sight of the area it flies through and deals magic damage to enemies hit.

1.text: Minions and non-epic  monsters take 50% reduced damage.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals ( 12% / 9%) of target's maximum health as bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum damage equal to 150% base AD and a maximum damage against monsters equal to 250% base AD. If the target is a champion, heal for ( 7.8% / 3.6%) of the target's maximum health, with a minimum heal equal to ( 97.5% / 60%) base AD (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5% armor penetration, and 5% magic penetration.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPELLBLADE: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals ( 12% /  9%) of target's maximum health as bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum damage equal to 150% base AD and a maximum damage against monsters equal to 250% base AD. If the target is a champion,  heal for ( 7.8% /  3.6%) of the target's maximum health, with a minimum heal equal to ( 97.5% /  60%) base AD (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Awe: Grants bonus attack damage equal to 2.5% maximum mana.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Consumes a charge on-hit and whenever affecting an enemy or ally with an ability to grant 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 for champion targets, up to maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Muramana at +360 mana.
